str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From allos; another's, i.e. Not one's own; by extension foreign, not akin, hostile.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Then, therefore, since. Probably from airo; a particle denoting an inference more or less decisive.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Free, delivered from obligation. Probably from the alternate of erchomai; unrestrained, i.e. not a slave, or exempt.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To say, declare. Properly, the same as the base of phos and phaino; to show or make known one's thoughts, i.e. Speak or say.
